intro.headline: My Projects
intro.copy: An overview of some things I've worked on between software, AI, hardware, and research..

projects.title: StudySmith
projects.description: An AI companion that scaffolds learning with deliberate practice, reflection, and spaced mastery.

projects.title: Analog AI Chip
projects.description: AI processor and simulator that uses asynchronous analog computing to run AI models orders of magnitude faster and more energy efficient than traditional digital computers.

projects.title: Laser Power Transmission System
projects.description: A laser power transmission system buit in collaboration with Tyndall National Institute that uses 450nm lasers to drive functional logic and transmission circuits, achieving significant wireless power transmission and broadening the field of power photonics, presented at Photonics Ireland.

projects.title: GridAI
projects.description: Custom machine learning to optimise energy policy and grid development.

projects.title: ForceField
projects.description: Impact-detecting sensor system for hurling helmets with custom mesh networking, enabling real-time concussion risk assessment across 100m+ range.

projects.title: Multipurpose Medical Database
projects.description: A database for medical practices to manage their patients, appointments, procedures, processes and more. Currently in-use at a medical practice.

projects.title: UCASH Financial Guidance
projects.description: A way to help students without financial literacy manage their finances and make better financial decisions.
